interface IAnyObject {
    [prop: string]: any
}

function mixin<T extends IAnyObject, U extends IAnyObject>(first: T, second: U): T & U {
    const result = <T & U>{};
    for (let id in first) {
      (<T>result)[id] = first[id];
    }
    for (let id in second) {
      if (!result.hasOwnProperty(id)) {
        (<U>result)[id] = second[id];
      }
    }
  
    return result;
  }
  
  const x = mixin({ a: 'hello' }, { b: 42 });
  
  // ç°åœ¨ x æ‹¥æœ‰äº† a å±æ€§ä¸ b å±æ€§
  const a = x.a;
  const b = x.b;

å¦‚æœTèƒ½èµ‹å€¼ç»™å‡½æ•°ç±»å‹ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›å‡½æ•°çš„è¿”å›ç±»å‹ã€‚é€šè¿‡infer Pæ¥æå–å‡½æ•°çš„è¿”å›ç±»å‹ã€‚

type ConstuctorParameters<T extends new (...args: any[]) => any> = T extends new (...args: infer P) => any ? P : never;

# inferçš„åº”ç”¨

# Exclude

type Exclude<T, U> = T extends U ? never : T;

type TT = Exclude<1 | 2, 1 | 3>; // 2

3

Exclude çš„ä½œç”¨æ˜¯ä»Tä¸­æ’é™¤å‡ºå¯åˆ†é…ç»™Uçš„å…ƒç´ ã€‚ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´ï¼Œå¦‚æœTä¸èƒ½èµ‹å€¼ç»™Uï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›è¯¥å€¼ã€‚å¦‚æœæœ‰å¤šä¸ªå€¼ä¸èƒ½èµ‹å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™TTæ˜¯è”åˆç±»å‹ã€‚

# Omit

type Omit<T, K> = Pick<T, Exclude<keyof T, K>>;

type Foo = Omit<{ name: string, age: number }, 'name'> // { age: number }

2
3

# Compute

type Compute<A extends any> = A extends Function ? A : { [K in keyof A]: A[K] };

type R1 = Compute<{ x: 'x' } & { y: 'y' }> // {x: "x", y: "y"}

type R2 = Compute<{ x: 'x'; y: 'y1' } & { y: 'y' }> // {x: "x", y: never}

3
4
5

Computeçš„ä½œç”¨æ˜¯å°†äº¤å‰ç±»å‹åˆå¹¶ã€‚

# Merge

type Merge<O1 extends object, O2 extends object> = Compute<O1 & Omit<O2, keyof O1>>;

type O1 = {
  name: string;
  id: string;
};

type O2 = {
  id: number;
  from: string;
};

type R2 = Merge<O1, O2>; // {name: string, id: string, from: string}

# Extract

Extract from T those types that are assignable to U.ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æå–Tä¸­å¯ä»¥èµ‹å€¼ç»™Uçš„å±æ€§ã€‚

type Extract<T, U> = T extends U ? T : never;
1

# Intersection

type Intersection<T extends object, U extends object> = Pick<
  T,
  Extract<keyof T, keyof U> & Extract<keyof U, keyof T>
>;

type Props = { name: string; age: number; visible: boolean };
type DefaultProps = { age: number };

type DuplicatedProps = Intersection<Props, DefaultProps>; // { age: number; }

é€šè¿‡å®ç°å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œå…ˆæå–å…¬ç”¨çš„å±æ€§ï¼Œç„¶åä»Tä¸­è¿›è¡Œå–å‡ºã€‚å› æ­¤åŒæ ·å±æ€§åçš„ï¼Œä»¥Tä¸ºå‡†ã€‚

# Overwrite

type Overwrite<
  T extends object,
  U extends object,
  I = Diff<T, U> & Intersection<U, T>
> = Pick<I, keyof I>;

// From T, pick a set of properties whose keys are in the union K
type Pick<T, K extends keyof T> = {
    [P in K]: T[P];
};

é€šè¿‡å±æ€§å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œæ ¸å¿ƒå®ç°æ˜¯Diff<T, U> & Intersection<U, T> ã€‚å°†å·®é›†å’Œäº¤é›†è¿›è¡Œäº¤å‰ï¼Œäº¤é›†ä»¥Uä¸­å±æ€§çš„ç±»å‹ä¸ºå‡†ã€‚ç„¶åå°†äº¤å‰ç±»å‹è¿›è¡ŒPickã€‚

# Mutable

type Mutable<T> = { -readonly [P in keyof T]: T[P] }

// Make all properties in T readonly
type Readonly<T> = {
    readonly [P in keyof T]: T[P];

# Record

// Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T
type Record<K extends keyof any, T> = {
    [P in K]: T;
};

type K = 'A' | 'B' | 'C';

// {A: {id: number}, B: {id: number}, C: {id: number}}
type result = Record<K, { id: number }>
